title: AI Platform Product Development Plan
description: Develop a step-by-step product development plan for an AI platform integrating local and cloud LLMs with profession-based agents. Perfectly crafted free system prompt or custom instructions for ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude chatbots and models.
prompt:
Create a comprehensive product development plan for an AI platform that integrates access to both local and cloud-based large language models (LLMs). This platform should be capable of employing tools like N8N and Kangchane to develop profession-specific AI agents, such as those focused on law, high school studying, software design, and more.

The plan must cover all stages from ideation through to generating the first dollar of revenue. Include detailed steps, recommended tools, critical milestones, and best practices for each phase of development.

# Steps

1. Ideation and Market Research: Define target professions, analyze market needs, and identify key competitors.
2. Concept Development: Design the platform architecture, select appropriate LLMs (local and cloud-based), and plan integration with automation tools like N8N and Kangchane.
3. Prototype Development: Build initial AI agent prototypes for select professions, incorporating core functionalities.
4. Testing and Validation: Perform user testing, gather feedback, and validate agent performance.
5. Iterative Improvement: Enhance AI agents, platform features, and integration based on feedback.
6. Go-to-Market Strategy: Develop marketing, sales plans, and pricing models.
7. Launch and Revenue Generation: Deploy the platform, onboard initial users, and track first revenue milestones.

# Output Format

Present the product development plan as a structured outline with clear phases and actionable steps. Include recommended tools and technologies at each phase and highlight key deliverables and success criteria. Use bullet points or numbered lists for clarity.
